    Methods

    Inherited from Cherrycake\Item

    public

    • __get() — Magic get method to return the Item's data corresponding to the specified $key If the key is for a database field that is language dependant as specified by $this->fields, the proper language data according to the current Locale language will be returned If the key is for a timezone dependant field as specified by $this->fields, the proper timezone adjusted timestamp will be returned according to the current Locale timezone
    • __isset() — Magic method to check if the data with the given $key is set
    • __set() — Magic set method to set the data $key to the given $value
    • clearCache() — clearCache
    • delete() — Deletes the data on the database representing this unique item, as per the current $idFieldName value
    • getForLanguage() — Gets the item data for the specificied language when the field is language dependant
    • getForTimezone() — Gets the item data for the specified timezone when the field is timezone dependant
    • getHumanized() — Gets the specified item data in a way that's readable for a human.
    • getLoadFromIdDatabaseQuery() — getLoadFromIdDatabaseQuery
    • getLoadFromStringFieldDatabaseQuery() — getLoadFromStringFieldDatabaseQuery
    • init() — init

    Inherited from Cherrycake\BasicObject

    public

    • build() — Creates an object and returns it
    • setProperties() — Bulk sets the given properties for this object
    • treatParameters() — Provides a system to pass complex parameters to a method, where parameters are passed in a hash array instead of the usual parameters passing method. A method using this system should accept a hash array of parameters and pass them as the first parameter to this method via a parent::treatParameters call, specifying as a second parameter a setup hash array of options for each parameter to be treated in a special way.
